snippet.title: Retaliate - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
You are valiant space hero who is not as fortunate as those in the golden age of scrolling shooters who had infinite ammo. Instead you must absorb your enemies' weapons and retaliate!

#indiegames #retrogames #shmup #game

Retaliate is a retro inspired space shooter with a twist, you start with no ammo!  Instead you must use your shield to both destroy enemies and absorb their weapons. The one line pitch for the game is essentially “Galaga X Kirby”, where you have the ability to absorb any weapon type your enemy shoots and use it against them.

Coming soon to Playstation, Xbox, and Steam!

Website: https://romansixvigaming.com/retaliate/
Playstation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10008228
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/retaliate/9n8l3sg7xzh5
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2828210/Retaliate/
